scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.build: cd frontend && GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false npm run build && cd .. && cp -r frontend/build/* .
scripts.build-only: cd frontend && GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false npm run build
scripts.restart-backend: pkill -f 'meditations.pihappy.me/backend' && cd backend && nohup npm start > ../backend.log 2>&1 &
scripts.status: ps aux | grep 'meditations.pihappy.me/backend' | grep -v grep || echo 'Backend not running'
